title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: After modifying the default value in the Edit Parameter dialog, the default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be retained even after modifying the default value in the Edit Parameter dialog.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and verify that the default value in the list box is still 'aa'.
